name: OR_CASE_2
description: The OR_CASE_2 table enables you to report on surgical and procedural case data. This table has the same basic structure as OR_CASE, but was created as a second table to prevent OR_CASE from getting any larger.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the case request record.

columns.name: SURGICAL_RISK_C_NAME
columns.description: The surgical risk level category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: POTENTL_BLOODLOSS_C_NAME
columns.description: The potential blood loss category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: AWARENESS_DT
columns.description: This column contains the date the patient was made aware of the surgery in the case record.

columns.name: READY_TO_SCHED_C_NAME
columns.description: The ready to schedule category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: SURGEON_REQ_LEN
columns.description: This column contains the surgeon requested length for the case in the case record.

columns.name: PAT_PAGER_NUM
columns.description: This column contains the patient pager number assigned in the case record.

columns.name: SPEC_NEED_RESOLV_DT
columns.description: This column contains the date special needs were resolved in the case record.

columns.name: AUTH_PROV_ID
columns.description: Item to store the authorizing provider for the case.

columns.name: PAT_START_TIME
columns.description: Shows the time the patient is scheduled to arrive at the OR.

columns.name: OB_CSECT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The c-section type category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: CASE_PULLED_C_NAME
columns.description: The case picking status category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: RSN_RETURN_OR_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason why a patient returns to the OR category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: INTER_BETWEEN_CASES
columns.description: The number of days that should be between two cases.

columns.name: PAT_FIRST_AVAIL_DT
columns.description: The date the patient is first available for surgery.

columns.name: PAT_COMPLEXITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient complexity category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: ANES_APPROVAL_DATE
columns.description: The date anesthesia was approved.

columns.name: APPROX_HEIGHT
columns.description: The approximate height of the patient in inches.

columns.name: INS_SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description: This item contains whether the patient's insurance is self-pay.

columns.name: PRE_OP_BED_ID
columns.description: The patient's pre-op bed can be entered in the case, prior to their arrival.

columns.name: PRE_OP_BED_ID_BED_LABEL
columns.description: The name of the bed.

columns.name: INTRAOP_XRAYS_CMT
columns.description: This column displays the comment about  intraop x-ray needs in a case.

columns.name: TRANSLATN_NEEDS_CMT
columns.description: This column displays the comment about translation needs in a case.

columns.name: LASER_NEEDS_COMMENT
columns.description: This column displays the comment about specific laser needs in a case.

columns.name: READY_TO_SCHED_DTTM
columns.description: This column displays the date and time that a case was marked as ready to schedule in order to help end-users prioritize cases when scheduling.

columns.name: IOP_XRAYS_C_NAME
columns.description: The intraop x-rays needed category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: ARE_PROPH_AB_REQ_C_NAME
columns.description: The prophylactic antibiotics required category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: PAT_SCHED_NOTICE
columns.description: Store number of days notice patient needs before surgery.

columns.name: CLASS_APPROP_C_NAME
columns.description: The case classification appropriateness category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: REVISD_CASE_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The revised case classification category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: PREOP_VISIT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The pre-op visit status category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: ADMIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The admit type category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: CANCELED_AT_LAST_MINUTE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the case was canceled for a non-clinical reason at the last minute (i.e., on the day of surgery or on the day of admission).

columns.name: CANCEL_TARGET_DT
columns.description: Stores the target date associated with the last minute canceled case. The target date is the date by which the last minute canceled case should be rescheduled to avoid a breach.

columns.name: IGNORE_TARGET_DATE_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the target date for rescheduling a case should be ignored. If this item is set to Yes, the case will be ignored when reporting on target date breaches for last minute canceled cases.

columns.name: IGNORE_TARGET_DATE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the last minute cancel reason for ignoring the target date for the surgical case. The target date is the date by which the last minute canceled case should be rescheduled to avoid a breach.

columns.name: TARGET_IGNORE_SET_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the user who flags the last minute canceled case to ignore the target date. The target date is the date by which the last minute canceled case should be rescheduled to avoid a breach.

columns.name: TARGET_IGNORE_SET_BY_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LAST_MIN_CANC_ORIGINAL_SURG_DT
columns.description: Stores the original surgery date associated with the last minute canceled case. Original surgery date is the scheduled surgery date when the case is canceled at the last minute for the first time.

columns.name: IN_OR_TO_PROC_LEN
columns.description: Records the estimated time to prep the patient from the time wheeled into the room until the procedure starts.

columns.name: CLOSE_TO_OUT_OR_LEN
columns.description: Records the estimated time between the procedure ending and the patient being wheeled out of the room.

columns.name: POSTOP_BED1_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The first post-op bed category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: POSTOP_BED1_DAYS_NEEDED
columns.description: The length in days the first post-op bed will be needed.

columns.name: POSTOP_BED1_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the record used for availability checking of the first post-op bed requested at the time of scheduling.

columns.name: POSTOP_BED2_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The second post-op bed category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: POSTOP_BED2_DAYS_NEEDED
columns.description: The length in days the second post-op bed will be needed.

columns.name: POSTOP_BED2_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the record used for availability checking of the second post-op bed requested at the time of scheduling.

columns.name: CUSTOM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The custom status category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: FOLLOWUP_APPT_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the time and date of a patient's post surgical follow-up appointment.

columns.name: WTIS_DX_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The WTIS diagnosis category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: WTIS_INTENT_SURGERY_C_NAME
columns.description: The WTIS intent of surgery category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: WTIS_PEDIATRIC_YN
columns.description: This item determines whether or not a case is considered pediatric for WTIS purposes. This item is only respected if the patient's age is between 18 and 23 as of the Decision to Treat Date (I ORC 8001). If a patient is under 18 the case will always be considered pediatric. If the patient is over 23 the case will never be considered pediatric.

columns.name: WTIS_SERVICE_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description: The WTIS service area category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: WTIS_SERVICE_DETAIL_1_C_NAME
columns.description: The WTIS service detail 1 category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: WTIS_SERVICE_DETAIL_2_C_NAME
columns.description: The WTIS service detail 2 category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: WTIS_PROC_CODE
columns.description: This item contains the full WTIS procedure code for a case.

columns.name: WTIS_WAIT_LIST_ID
columns.description: Stores the wait list ID of the WTIS wait list for the case. This item is automatically generated by the system based on the case ID. The wait list ID is in the format <case ID> or <case ID>.<unique number>.

columns.name: WTIS_WAIT_LIST_CREATED_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the WTIS create wait list message was already sent for the case. This is used by interfaces to suppress sending other update messages for the case, if the create message has not been sent yet.

columns.name: PREOP_REQUESTED_VISIT_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the date/time for the requested pre-op visit.

columns.name: GRAVIDITY
columns.description: The number of times the patient has been pregnant.

columns.name: PARITY
columns.description: The number of pregnancies the patient has carried to viable gestational age.

columns.name: DESIRED_DTTM
columns.description: The desired date and time to schedule the patient's planned C-section.

columns.name: EST_DUE_DATE
columns.description: The expected date of delivery/estimated date of confinement.

columns.name: DESIRED_DATE_GEST_AGE
columns.description: The gestational age, in weeks, of the baby at the time of the desired date of the patient's planned C-section.

columns.name: WTIS_CODE_PROC_C_NAME
columns.description: The Wait Time Information System (WTIS) procedure code category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: SERVICE_TARGET_EFFORT_YN
columns.description: Flag to indicate that additional effort was needed on behalf of staff to work this encounter in order to meet service targets.

columns.name: P_CATS_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The Pediatric Canadian Access Targets for Surgery (P-CATS) diagnosis code category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: EXPECTED_ADMISSION_TIME
columns.description: This item stores the time the patient is expected to be admitted for surgery, as documented in the surgical case in I ORC 7617 - EXPECTED ADMISSION TIME. Column PAT_ENC_HSP__EXP_ADMISSION_TIME should be used to report on the expected admission date and time for the admission linked to the surgery (I EPT 10301 - EXPECTED ADMISSION DATE and I EPT 10300 - EXPECTED ADMISSION TIME).  If a time is set in I ORC 7617, the expected admission time in the linked admission is set to that time. If I ORC 7617 is not set, the expected admission time in the linked admission is calculated as the scheduled surgery time (OR_CASE__TIME_SCHEDULED) minus the number of hours in OR_CASE_2__EXPECTED_ADMISSION_TIME_OFFSET. If multiple cases are linked to the same admission, the earliest time from the list of linked cases will be set as the expected admission time on the linked admission.

columns.name: OPERATION_INTENTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The operation intention category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: TRIAGE_SCORE
columns.description: Stores a triage score for the case. This information would be obtained from a third-party.

columns.name: REGISTRY_SCORE
columns.description: Stores a registry score for the case. This information would be obtained from a third-party.

columns.name: ACATS_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The Adult Coding Access Targets for Surgery (ACATS) code diagnosis category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The external systems case status category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: PREP_TIME_MOD_YN
columns.description: Has patient prep time been modified by user

columns.name: POSTOP_LEVEL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: The planned post-op level of care category ID for the surgical case.

columns.name: CASE_ACCESS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Date and time of the last time case entry was opened.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Record status flag. Used in conjunction with record archived flag for encounter archiving.

columns.name: CLASS_REVIEW_DATE
columns.description: The most recent time clinical prioritization was reviewed.

columns.name: CLINICAL_SAFE_DATE
columns.description: How long clinical prioritization is valid.

columns.name: NHSN_TRAUMA_ORC_YN
columns.description: This is used to indicate whether the case qualifies as an NHSN trauma case (blunt or penetrating injury).

columns.name: TRAUMA_CASE_ORC_YN
columns.description: This is used to indicate whether the case should be classified as a trauma case.

columns.name: NHSN_EMERG_ORC_YN
columns.description: This is used to indicated whether the case qualifies as an NHSN emergency case (unplanned or unscheduled).

columns.name: CENTRAL_INTAKE_NUMBER
columns.description: This stores the Central Intake Number also called RAC number.

columns.name: CASE_VERIFIED_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the case has been verified.
